title: Dark theme is not very readable in some places
body:
**Describe the bug**
The dark theme seems to be forgotten in some places

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Switch to dark theme
2. browse the page

I believe it does not need any additional information.

Otherwise thank you for the nice tool! <3
author: woozar

comments.body: I just stumbled over the dashboard in the Task Runner. Is there anything else you have seen?
Under Settings and AI Function Limits, the titles for the check boxes are in black and hard to read.
in dark mode that white box background is very hard to read

Task runner status and black text in the settings are the two things, that draw my attention in the first place.

Also I just realised, that the theme trigger (that button in the top right corner) on the "Manual" page is not working.

I also found some "minor" stuff (I would not have created a ticket for that).
* would be awesome if the box with the text "The application is already configured. You can update the configuration below." was also darker in dark mode. 
* the background of the pie chart in "Document Type Distribution"
* paperless itself has a dark mode for its pdf preview tiles. is it somehow possible to use that in the Playground in paperless-ai in dark mode? (that is probably more of a feature request)

> Task runner status and black text in the settings are the two things, that draw my attention in the first place.
> 
> Also I just realised, that the theme trigger (that button in the top right corner) on the "Manual" page is not working.
> 
> I also found some "minor" stuff (I would not have created a ticket for that).
> 
> * would be awesome if the box with the text "The application is already configured. You can update the configuration below." was also darker in dark mode.
> * the background of the pie chart in "Document Type Distribution"
> * paperless itself has a dark mode for its pdf preview tiles. is it somehow possible to use that in the Playground in paperless-ai in dark mode? (that is probably more of a feature request)

Thanks for the specific information. Funny how I never realized that the switch on the manual page is not working. 😆
A pleasure to work with people, who react on bug reports. Happy to help with my reports.

Fixed the issues + also added the invert of documents in playground for better visibility. 
Will be available with the next release.

title: OpenAI API Key is not valid. Please check the key.
body:
Hey Clusterzx,
 I'm just about to set up paperless-ai, now it only fails because of the OpenAI key "OpenAI API Key is not valid. Please check the key." The key is 100% correct... Do you have any idea what else I'm doing wrong?
author: UncleCCC

comments.body: Do you have positive balance on this key? Free-Tier does not work.
Ohhh sorry... That was the mistake, I have little experience with OpenAI... I have a ChatGPT license, I thought this also applies to OpenAI. Now it works thanks for your quick help

title: Rescan after Prompt Description change.
body:
Hi,

Thanks for this great tool.

I have one question regarding understanding.

Today I set up paperless-ai and successfully scanned over 400 documents. Tags and types are working fine, and all documents have an "ai-processed" tag.

Now I decided to change many settings in the "Prompt Description" to optimize the output. I thought I could simply rescan everything and that the optimized prompts would be applied to all documents, but it's not working.

How can I rescan all documents with the new Prompt Description?

Thanks a lot.
author: kolossboss

comments.body: You could easily go to History and delete the documents you want to reprocess.

title: Chat feature not working with Custom AI agents
body:
**Describe the bug**
Chat not working with "Custom" agents.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Configure a Custom provider, in my case local llama.cpp.
2. Process a document.
3. Open a chat for it, from any access.

**Expected behavior**
Chat to start using the custom provider.


**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Any
 - Browser: Any
 - Version: 2.30

**Additional context**
I can see in the logs that the chat feature seems to expect OpenAI:
paperless-ai           | [ERRO] initializing chat: Error: OpenAI client not initialized
paperless-ai           |     at ChatService.initializeChat (/app/services/chatService.js:64:15)
author: chwoa

comments.body:
You are right! Forgot to implement it there. Pushing an update today!
Thank you very much for reporting.
That was quick! Confirmed it is working in 2.3.1. Thank you very much!

title: Login failing
body:
**Describe the bug**
After finalizing the setup I am not able to log back into the dashboard.

**To Reproduce**
- finalize setup with user name and password
- save settings
- once restarted, log in through the UI

log shows:
Login attempt for user: PaperlessAI
Password validation result: false

I have tried removing the .env (and config) files.
removed the whole container

Please let me know if there is more information I can provide.
author: CreekDuzz

comments.body:
You could look into the database what is stored in the "users" table. But the password is bcrypt encrypted. 

You can go to any website you want where you can generate a bcrypt hash and paste it the generated hash over the Old one. 

But normally there is no bug or issue known regarding your description.
That was it. I did not think about the DB containing the login info. I removed the old DB and once the new were created, its working. Thank you!

Maybe you entered only some false login credentials thinking of a different password or capslock. I don't know 😅

But there is no bug currently known, the login page is present since some versions now. If there was then there would be more people with the same issue. 

So who knows what it was, luckily it works now! Have a great day ❤️
